headline: Is There Still Opportunity in GE After Its 77% Price Surge in 2025?
summary: Ever wondered if General Electric’s remarkable run means there is still value left to capture, or if you might be jumping in when the price has already soared? The stock has climbed an impressive 77.0% year-to-date and is up 64.9% over the past year, though it has dipped slightly by 4.0% in the last month. Recent headlines highlight General Electric’s progress on restructuring into leaner, more focused businesses, alongside growing buzz in the industrial sector about sustained infrastructure...
